name: Disney Junior
description:
Tablet-targeted responsive redesign of DisneyJunior.com

Targeted user interaction towards the 3-8 year old demographic, incorporating large hit areas, simplified navigation, iconography for non-readers, and continuous swiping to browse content

Worked primarily on IA, UX, and interaction development, and conducted user studies and testing

Designed flexible Custom Grid System that powered the majority of the site

Designed and coded background to reflect the current time of day with corresponding animations: morning, afternoon, evening, night, and midnight. During day the clouds would float across the sky, and clicking on the clouds had an easter egg of an animated rainbow, while nighttime had a sleeping moon and shooting stars.

2014 Webby Award Nomination: Youth Website
